greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: A symmetrical triangle of coefficients read by rows: t(n,m)=(n - m + 1)*(m + 1)*binomial[n, m].
comment: Read as a square array, this array factorizes as M*transpose(M), where M = (k*binomial(n,k))n,k>=1 = A003506(n,k). - _Peter Bala_, Mar 06 2017
link: Indranil Ghosh, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..5151 (Rows 0..100 of triangle, flattened)
mathematica: t[n_, m_] := (n - m + 1)*(m + 1)*Binomial[n, m]; Table[Table[t[n, m], {m, 0, n}], {n, 0, 10}]; Flatten[%]
program: (PARI) t(n,m)=(n - m + 1)*(m + 1)*binomial(n, m) \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Feb 15 2017
results.author: _Roger L. Bagula_ and _Gary W. Adamson_, Aug 22 2008
